C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: release-name-minio-bucket
args: /usr/bin/mc config host add plane-app-minio http://release-name-minio.default.svc.cluster.local:9000 "$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID" "$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY";  /usr/bin/mc mb plane-app-minio/$AWS_S3_BUCKET_NAME;  /usr/bin/mc anonymous set download plane-app-minio/$AWS_S3_BUCKET_NAME; exit 0;

command: until nslookup  release-name-minio.default.svc.cluster.local; do echo waiting for  release-name-minio; sleep 2; done
initContainers.name: init

containers.name: release-name-api-migrate
command: python manage.py wait_for_db && python manage.py migrate
